website_summaries.verdict: Made from natural ingredients, this bodywash cleans without irritating or drying out skin.
cons: Does not lather up as well as the other products on the list

customer_reviews.title: Cruelty free and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after he kept having to use my "girly" scented products, and he's loved it. I was concerned about the overwhelming bourbon smell, thinking he might get pegged as a heavy drinker at work, but it's actually really subtle. It smells nice and clean and after one of his showers, the bathroom continues to smell really good. My favorite part is that it's cruelty free and is relatively natural without being sticky, drying, or rough like some other "natural" products out there. It lasts a while with the pump, so we've had it for a few months and now I'm back on here to re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Best body wash out there.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always used Axe or Old Spice body wash and they both work fine. However, I had to use quite a bit for it to lather up enough for me to get my entire body. That is not the case with Olivina body wash. It lathers up way easier with less product and the scent is so fresh and unique. My girlfriend loves it and says she can smell it on me all night after I shower. It also has natural ingredients and makes my skin feel better than those other brands. Best body wash out there. I will be trying the other scents after I run out of Bourbon Cedar.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t handle shipping well
customer_reviews.text: This soap is great but every time I purchase it, the bottle leaks.
customer_reviews.author: sammyku

customer_reviews.title: Good masculine body wash!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this smells! Actually has a great mix of cedar and bourbon. Had to knock off a star cause it doesn't lather all that well and the scent last for maybe an hour. But it's body wash not deodorant so what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Star

customer_reviews.title: "Did you wrestle a Christmas tree?"
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this, (I also purchased the solid cologne), I took a shower and put solid cologne on. I met my wife at the door when she got home from shopping to she if she noticed my new scent. She hugged me and said, "did you wrestle a Christmas tree?" Several hours later her sister came over to visit, after letting her in, she walked by me and said, "you smell like a Christmas tree." Not the reaction I was hoping for. I gave it 3 stars cause the scent last a long time, just not the scent for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: Love This, Smell is Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I find the smell of this product absolutely intoxicating. I sometimes open the bottle just to smell it, it's super relaxing. It works very well for hair, I found mine feeling fresh and exceptionally clean after using my conditioner following it. As a face wash it's good for dry or combination skin, I have extremely oily skin on my face, and it definitely didn't leave it feeling as clean and refreshed as my normal face wash. All in all, if you like to stand in the plywood section of Home Depot, that's as accurate as I can describe the smell.
customer_reviews.author: LinuxCharms

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good bodywash, except the scent does not stay with ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good bodywash, except the scent does not stay with you. After drying off I could no longer smell the Bourbon Cedar smell.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best Smelling Body Wash for a MAN PERIOD!
customer_reviews.text: You've tried all those others, you know the Feminine type smelling body washes etc.. they all pretty much smell the same.. As a guy you want something a little more you unique something that is meant for Men.. This is it.. I first tried this like 4 months ago with a small 3 oz tube and was amazed at the smell. It must be the Cedarwood which is just the perfect Smell not too Musky but strong enough to tell it made for Man. Try it you will not be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: T Zeno

customer_reviews.title: Barely any scent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who liked the idea of an 'everything' shower wash. Right away he had to stop using it on his hair as it left his hair looking and feeling as if it wasn't washed so he switched right back to shampoo. The scent is barely there and in fact he can't smell it at all while I can but very faintly. Left us wondering if this is possibly diluted because the person who recommended it said the smell is his favorite. Hmmm
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: Just wasn’t good
customer_reviews.text: So, I’m searching for a new body wash. I purchased this product in hopes I might find something that both smells great and for a good price. This product was neither. The odor wasn’t great. I wouldn’t recommend the product. I wouldn’t give it a 1 star because it’s not terrible just not something I would say is attractive
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Smell and Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: This smells great and leaves me feeling clean. I was concerned I would feel oily soon after my shower. I am naturally a greasy person, and this cleaned as well as prevented me from feeling greasy after my shower throughout the day. I cannot emphasize how good the smell is, strong cedar wood smell. Makes me feel like I'm in a natural wood sauna. It is a little pricey, especially for the travel size container.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pumps are defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I liked how it came in a pump bottle. Unfortunately the pump dosnt dispence soap from the nozzle, instead it pumps up the side of the mechanism and makes a big mess all over the sides of the bottle. I bought two different bottles and they both do this. Don't count on yours working.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Does not ship well
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but lost about 1/3 of this during shipping. Overall a 5 star product, but loss so much I can’t honestly give it a full 5 stars. Not sure if I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: AmaBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great body wash
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance of this product is wonderful. The 'straw" which draws the product to the spout was too long and the product woulldn't come out. it worked fine when we cut the end.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Messy Delivery
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of the bar soap I thought purchasing something of this size would not only any last longer, but be easy to pour bits at time into smaller bottles for travel. The size is great so long as all of it stays in the bottle during shipping. Nearly a third of it leaked out into the box and all over the plastic bag it was haphazardly wrapped in. The only upside that it somewhat smelled good. The downside in using this compared to the bar is that the fragrance is waaaay more intense. Use sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Fonz

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious
customer_reviews.text: My husband is turning into a man's man which apparently means using expensive soap. But this stuff is good. Smells great and Greats the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J.anady

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo and body wash
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with how well this cleans. Most 2 in 1 leave hair dry. This leaves your hair and skin moisturized. The scent is close to the cologne but not much cedar and more bourbon. Still great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product has a fresh clean result to all parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Require a little of product to clean body.The product has a fresh clean result to all parts of my body;without residue or pore filling substance ! And don't strip the natural oil from my skin !!.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scent is bourbon, hold the cedar
customer_reviews.text: So, first off, don’t expect any cedar from this. It smells like they actually put bourbon in it. Like, you can actually smell the alcohol of bourbon. It isn’t so strong that others will think you’re on the bottle, but it isn’t the best either. If nothing else it’s manly, almost to a fault. Do not recommend for anyone looking for musk, only useful for making your shower smell like a liquor store
customer_reviews.author: Jessie T

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff...wish the price was a bit better but I will continue to buy it. Also a little goes a long way, it lathers up really well.
customer_reviews.author: SHoguet

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe what a great shampoo this is, in addition to being a great smelling body wash. I have 6 different shampoos in my shower because I'm always looking for one that works better on my fine hair. This stuff leaves it full, and managable ( I know this sounds like a commercial, but I'm impressed). I workout almost daily and usually need to take two showers a day. Hair still comes out looking good. Worth trying boys ...
customer_reviews.author: Bob the Man

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the simple guy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the simple guy. No more seperate shampoo and body wash, this works well for both hair and body, working up a nice lather either way it's used.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful find
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff! Great smell great appeal and bonus it last a lomg time cause a little goes a long way. My only complaint,if it can be called such, is they dont sell it in any store near me.
customer_reviews.author: tousen

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: I only opened the box today and it wasn't wrapped in anything protective so it cracked and leaked. I am never buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Burke

customer_reviews.title: Asked for a refund
customer_reviews.text: Showed up broken/partially crushed, but I wasn't too bothered by the loss because the smell was just awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Smells So Good
customer_reviews.text: Washing with this is a great way to wake up in the morning. It smells so good! It's maybe a little on the expensive side, but right now I'm thinking it might just be worth it. I'm interested in trying their other scents next.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Husband and teen approved!
customer_reviews.text: I’m picky when it comes to ingredients and my husband and son just care for a great smell and product that doesn’t leave them dry. This is a win, win! Plus, I like how the product smells too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good scent, bad vendor
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the scent but I am disappointed in the shipment. About 1/10 of both of the bottles I ordered leaked and it appears the shipped knew it would leak. They were both in plastic bags that seemed like and afterthought and the lids were not fully screwed in. I feel like i lost about $2 worth of product per bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sabourin

customer_reviews.title: Good soap
customer_reviews.text: A nice body soap but very faint scent and bottle is hard to squeeze
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was not screwed on tight and it leaked in the package. Other than that it was ok
customer_reviews.author: AshMox

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed with the smell of this product. I don't have a tremendously sensitive sense of smell but this item smells like a sticky bathroom floor in a dingy bar. Be warned, this is not going to leave you feeling and smelling clean.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is all about this body wash. Is higher quality than your typical grocery store brand. Pleasing, luxurious scent that sticks with you, but is not overbearing or really noticeable to others nearby.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipping dropped the ball
customer_reviews.text: The product is exceptional for what is advertised. I feel like I have to use more of it than normal body washed to get clean but that could just be subjective. My only real complaint is that when I got it there had been a leak in the shipping process so the whole thing was covered in body wash and there was about an oz missing from the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this soap smells and it leaves my skin feeling great. Based on the pictures, though, I was expecting a pump dispenser but it came with just a regular squeeze top. I’m guessing this is because of the numerous reviews that mentioned the product being delivered with a leak, and i’d rather have that than a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Day

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my picky son. He loved it surprisingly he is a Critic of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Missy

customer_reviews.title: not a long-lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: good scent but very very temporary. I also think black oak is better than bourbon cedar. Just imp.
customer_reviews.author: Tejas

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Skin still feels dry. Like the other reviews say, doesnt lather
customer_reviews.author: Justin M Schafers

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Bourbon amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: It smells great, I like the way it feels on my body. I have been using old spice body wash since my late 20's and last year I found this and haven't gone back yet. Olivina men's wash is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Mr, S

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell makes my skin feel great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this body wash now for over a year the price is extremely high but well worth the cost. The center of the body wash is amazing I just wish it would lather up more and last a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent body wash
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and cleaning. Not over powering but just the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband Likes It
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this. He’s gotten it at least a couple of times now. He’s really into going with more natural products nowadays. He wouldn’t get it more than once if it didn’t work well for him.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousRooster

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Simple sent profile one stop hair and body wash cuts sweat oil and grime and rinses clean. Its all I will use
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Nice for women, too
customer_reviews.text: This smells wonderful. I use it exclusively as shampoo, and it lathers up and cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: Milarky

customer_reviews.title: Shipping needs better attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but not the first time purchasing. That said it is the first time I received my product and 80% of it was leaking into the plastic bag and box. Someone decided not to check to make sure the plunger was tightly screwed on... Not happy with the QA on this shipment.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The only reason it is 4 Stars is because of """Packaging""" issues. The bottle comes covered in product that leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Shianne A.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged
customer_reviews.text: About 25% of the product was spilled in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Having been using Olivina for a while now, my girlfriend loves how it smells and I love how I feel after I use it. Will be recording.
customer_reviews.author: Rand77

customer_reviews.title: The smell is great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my father and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: A potato

customer_reviews.title: Clean open fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Great fragrance/ a favorite of my husband and mine when he is wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: mrsbill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My Fiance Lovvvveee's this body wash! He also has the cologne and deodorants! Came quickly and no damage!
customer_reviews.author: Thelovelynrt

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product smells fabulous and works great as face/body/shampoo and it rinses well. This is the second time I have bought it and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and I feel refreshed after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoma

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance but fades fast.
customer_reviews.text: Great fragrance. Husband enjoys these products for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Jona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent and it doesn't leave you feeling dry.
customer_reviews.author: diana365

customer_reviews.title: Wierd
customer_reviews.text: The smell is weird. I recognize the smell but can't place it . It does not smell like bourbon and cedar.......
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Ordering again for sure!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hooked! Smells really good and lasts for most of the day. Nice super clean feeling, and smells much better than the old spice/Irish spring I was using before. Couple this with their bourbon cedar deodorant and St James of London cedar cologne. Perfect combo for that outdoorsman scent
customer_reviews.author: Taj Hasty

customer_reviews.title: Read the Label
customer_reviews.text: If you want to smell like strong alcohol... this is your bodywash. If you prefer a different scent for your body... try something else.
customer_reviews.author: BlackForestJake

customer_reviews.title: Great fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: Love the subtle fragrance and quality. Lathers well and rinses our completely leaving hair and beard manageable without drying.
customer_reviews.author: Al Cave

customer_reviews.title: Very Average
customer_reviews.text: The product is less than I had hoped. It received great reviews in Men's Journal but that is not the case with me scent is very light and after drying off dissipates. Value was very average.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davanzo

customer_reviews.title: Love & hate
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but the way this has been shipped and damaged is unacceptable especially for someone that doesn’t pay taxes like the owner. They should have better packaging for liquid substance.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, great product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what other people are saying but this suds up well. Only need 2 pumps
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Best body wash for men
customer_reviews.text: Spent years looking for a more natural body wash and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband typically is picky when it comes to all-in-one’s but lives the smell, says hair feels clean & rinses well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Lathers up quite decent after dispensing one pump onto a loofah. Doesn’t really smell like bourbon but it’s scent is “woodsy” and relaxing. Didn’t leave my skin oily or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty reasonable and flexible... but this snelkas horrible. The packaging is nice though and would have been great for travel carryon
customer_reviews.author: #teamjeffbezos

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Product is much smaller than expected. Price for such a small item was more like a sample. Smells okay, but compared to other similar smells it doesn't smell as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Bigger + better
customer_reviews.text: I first found this soap at Target and loved it. Target no longer carries it. This is a much larger bottle at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: nick casarez

customer_reviews.title: Defective bottle
customer_reviews.text: The plunger/dispenser didn’t work - not sure if mine was a one off or if they are all defective. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: John Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is very heavy and the cleaning effect is general.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Creager

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scent
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice. I really wanted the discontinued Ginger Beer scent, but this one is almost as yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think I’ll ever go back to Irish spring this stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good, but one of the caps on the bottle wasn’t tight and half of it leaked all over the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A little goes a long way. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Mirisha

customer_reviews.title: What a great surprise buy!
customer_reviews.text: Was really suprised how much I liked the scent. Also a lot of body washes cause me to break out not this one
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Knox

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and the cap was broken and a few oz of product was spilled out
customer_reviews.author: jack p.

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean
customer_reviews.text: Amazing love the scent so much, so fresh and so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Gets my bod clean and smells great. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, husband loves it. The packaging was the problem, leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, good lather, all in an easy to use bottle. Very masculine scent but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: not the same smell as the bar soap
customer_reviews.text: disappointed. I have used the bar soap for some time and like the fragrance, so figured i'd try the body wash and shampoo. The fragrance is not the same and very light. The product is also very thin compared to your average body wash and/or shampoo; you have to use a lot to suds up. I know wish i'd bought the smaller bottle and not spent $33.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great product, pleasing scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but a loose cap and spacious packaging caused the loss of a couple ounces. Despite the mess, I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: The soap foams well, seems to clean okay, and smells good. However, there is no odor control like you get with charcoal or certain other soap ingredients, and the scent of the soap itself doesn't last very long. End result: I smell "natural" (but still mostly clean) by mid-afternoon. I ended up throwing it out, not because it was terrible (it isn't) but because there is better (and cheaper) stuff I'd rather use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scent. Undertones of a smoked vanilla
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scent. Undertones of a smoked vanilla, almost like a bourbon Manhattan. Girlfriend says the scent stayed all day. Lathers very nicely in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband's favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in a smaller bottle as part of a gift set for my husband a few Christmases ago, and he loved it. So when I found a large bottle, he had to have it! It's definitely a masculine scent, but not so manly that this lady doesn't sneak and use some every now and then too! The scent has a good throw as well, it lingers for a good while on the person and the shower after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Got it because the cologne was amazing but after using it for a week I can say it is by far the worst product ever. I broke out in a full body rash and hives. A few family members tried it washing their hand and they broke out nearly instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Anubis Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Smells so gooooood....
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this stuff! I introduced it to a skeptical friend (thought the name sounded like the smell of a drunken carpenter... "Bourbon Cedar" HAHA) and he actually really loves it too. Feels great, rinses clean, leaves a subtle scent but not overpowering. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: LBooth

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Olivina Men, Hair, Face & Body All-in-One Wash is probably the best all in one I've ever used. It does a great job cleaning all over and leaves me smelling great (or so I'm told). As far as cleaning goes, it doesn't leave my hair, beard, or skin either too dry or too oily. It leaves the right bits clean and soft without being too much. The scent is strong enough to be noticeable but still subtle enough to not be bothersome. I will continue to buy this product whenever I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and truly a full body wash and shave product
customer_reviews.text: The scent on this is great. What I really appreciate is that it truly is a full body wash. Many of the combined soaps leave your hair limp and greasy looking but this product doesn't. I lather up with this from head to toe and then shave my face without any extra cream, rinse it all down and I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: M. David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Terrible scent
customer_reviews.text: I've had other bourbon or whiskey "scents" before that were good, bad, or meh. This one is pretty much like opening a bottle. Tossed it after 3 tries.
customer_reviews.author: William Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my new "go to" body wash. I love the smell of this stuff and it doesn't leave a slick or oily residue that leaves me feeling like I need to rinse again. I'll buy it again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Moosedidit

customer_reviews.title: Where's the pump?
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap, this is the 2nd time I've purchased it. BUT, unlike the vendor's photos, it has no pump. If I had known this was a refill bottle, I would have saved the previous bottle, or wouldn't have purchased it. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mattereaterlad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this bodywash for over 6 months, and even in our dryer climate it is great! I am going to purchase the larger bottle right now! try it!
customer_reviews.author: NW Education Specialist

customer_reviews.title: great scent of cedar and bourbon
customer_reviews.text: Very masculine scent, much better than store brands like Axe. I have purchased several times, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JediMutt

customer_reviews.title: OK, not lasting
customer_reviews.text: This cleans fine, and it should (it is an all body wash, after all) and it smells great in the shower itself, but the scent does not linger in the least.
customer_reviews.author: Mlkcrawford

customer_reviews.title: Love this product but the dispenser was defective
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product. The Bourbon Cedar smell is amazing. The only issue is with the dispenser, which I had to use a pair of pliers on to get the spring to pop up. Otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Slowemm

customer_reviews.title: I love the simplicity of this wash
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of this wash. This scent is very masculine and rinses easily. No complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, cleans well. Leaves my hair in great shape. Smells like camping.
customer_reviews.author: Steeve

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: I like this company’s line of product but this was just ok. Not a horrible product, but just don’t feel the need to buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: If you've tried several that don't quite get it right, try this one next, its possibly just what you were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It foams really well, it smells fantastic, not too ver the top, and I think I will be purchasing this one again. Finally after trying many shower gels that suit my scent preference, this one delivers on point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I loved the scent and was disappointed when Target stopped selling it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim90210

product_meta.title: Olivina Men Hair, Face & Body All-in-One Wash
product_meta.description:
Color:Bourbon Cedar| Size:16 Fl OzOlivina Men Hair, Face & Body All-in-One Wash. Pare down your regimen! Refresh face, body, and hair with just one effective formula that removes dirt and grime without leaving you dry or oily.
